    • Method Detail

      • scanForUsbDevices

        public abstract java.util.Map<SerialNumber,DeviceManager.DeviceType> scanForUsbDevices()
                                                                                throws RobotCoreException
        Get a listing of all HiTechnic devices connected.

        This method will attempt to open all USB devices that are using an FTDI USB chipset. It will then probe the device to determine if it is a HiTechnic device. Finally, it will close the device.

        Because of the opening and closing of devices, it is recommended that this method is not called while any FTDI devices are in use.

        Returns:
        a map of serial numbers to HiTechnic device types
        Throws:
        RobotCoreException - if unable to open a device
